channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 19:38 Air alarm to Ternopil Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 19:38 Air alarm to Ternopil Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Ternopil_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 19:29 The threat of artobrats in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community.
item.description: 游리 19:29 The threat of artobrats in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 19:29 Attention! Please note that the alarm is still in:- Nikopol district
item.description: 游리 19:29 Attention! Please note that the alarm is still in:- Nikopol district#m_nikopol_that_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
